entry.dcterms:title: The Mental Health of the Adult Population of the United States of America 1976
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C23: The Mental Health of the Adult Population of the United States of America 1976. data sheet. Version: 2009-09-11
entry.dcterms:creator: Donovan, Elisabeth
Kulka, Richard A.
Veroff, Joseph
entry.dcterms:description: various problem areas, including marriage, child-parent relationship, and profession; the use of leisure time, physical and mental health in the past and present, striving for social contacts, achievement, and influence (a repetition of the 1957 study); people's willingness to ask for experts' assistance; evaluation of experts they turn to and the assistance received from them

cross-section
Multi-stage, national probability sample of households. One randomly selected individual per household make up the sample.
data collection with questionnaire
A
